hotels.name: The Oberoi Udaivilas
hotels.description: The Oberoi Udaivilas is a luxury resort located on the banks of Lake Pichola in Udaipur, Rajasthan. Renowned for its stunning architecture that reflects the grandeur of Rajasthan's royal heritage, the hotel offers lush gardens, courtyards, fountains, and domed structures. Guests enjoy luxurious rooms with semi-private pools, fine dining experiences, and scenic lake views, making it an unforgettable retreat.

hotels.name: Taj Mahal Palace
hotels.description: A symbol of luxury and heritage, the Taj Mahal Palace overlooks the Arabian Sea and the iconic Gateway of India. This legendary hotel features grand colonial-era architecture and exquisite interiors, offering unparalleled hospitality. It boasts world-class dining, luxury rooms, and a history intertwined with Mumbai's vibrant culture.

hotels.name: Leela Palace
hotels.description: The Leela Palace in New Delhi is a grand blend of Lutyens-inspired architecture and modern luxury. Situated in the heart of the capital, the hotel offers palatial interiors, royal hospitality, luxurious spa treatments, and exquisite dining options that redefine sophistication and elegance.

hotels.name: Rambagh Palace
hotels.description: Known as the 'Jewel of Jaipur,' the Rambagh Palace is a former royal residence turned luxury hotel. Its majestic architecture, sprawling gardens, and opulent interiors exude the grandeur of Rajasthan. Guests can experience princely living with luxurious suites, fine dining, and traditional Rajasthani hospitality.

hotels.name: The Tamara
hotels.description: Nestled in the lush green hills of Coorg, The Tamara offers a tranquil escape amidst nature. This eco-friendly resort is known for its luxurious cottages with private decks, coffee plantation tours, spa services, and breathtaking views of the Western Ghats, making it perfect for a serene getaway.

hotels.name: Umaid Bhawan Palace
hotels.description: Perched on a hilltop in Jodhpur, the Umaid Bhawan Palace is a stunning blend of Art Deco and royal Rajasthani design. This luxurious palace hotel offers grand rooms, museum tours, and fine dining experiences, giving guests a glimpse into the lavish lifestyle of the erstwhile Maharajas.

hotels.name: Wildflower Hall
hotels.description: Set in the serene hills of Shimla, Wildflower Hall is an Oberoi property offering a perfect retreat in the lap of the Himalayas. Guests enjoy panoramic views, luxurious suites, fine dining, and a heated outdoor infinity pool surrounded by cedar forests, making it a haven for nature lovers.

hotels.name: ITC Grand Bharat
hotels.description: Located in Gurgaon, ITC Grand Bharat is a magnificent luxury resort offering grandeur and sustainability. It features elegant suites, a 27-hole golf course, state-of-the-art spa services, and culinary experiences inspired by Indian heritage, all set amidst lush greenery.

hotels.name: Marari Beach Resort
hotels.description: Located near Alleppey in Kerala, Marari Beach Resort is a serene escape known for its sustainable tourism practices. Guests can unwind in traditional villas, enjoy fresh seafood, and experience authentic Kerala culture while relaxing by the pristine Marari Beach.

hotels.name: Vivanta by Taj
hotels.description: Vivanta by Taj in Goa is a luxury hotel offering a vibrant mix of modern amenities and Goan charm. Known for its beachfront views, lush greenery, and lively atmosphere, it provides exceptional dining, wellness services, and adventure activities for a memorable stay.

hotels.name: Evolve Back
hotels.description: Located by the Kabini River in Karnataka, Evolve Back offers a luxurious safari experience amidst pristine wilderness. The resort features eco-friendly cottages, private pools, wildlife safaris, and local cultural experiences, making it an ideal destination for nature enthusiasts.

hotels.name: Neemrana Fort Palace
hotels.description: Situated in Agra, The Oberoi Amarvilas offers unmatched views of the Taj Mahal. With its Mughal-inspired architecture, luxurious suites, and world-class hospitality, the hotel ensures an unforgettable stay in the city of love.
